comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Did you ever notice how those who worked in the open have very dark features in these old photographs?  I am sure that it is because they are so weatherbeaten but they almost look black in some of them.  Interesting shot of the group and the situation.

comment.author: 51841741@N07
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland] 

Well  Ed's grandfather was an Irish immigrant to the  USA so maybe there was a genetic relationship to the old water lady.

I did know of a girl surnamed McCarthy that looked a lot like JFK but since Jack was notorious womanizer that would not be a surprise.

I did find Patrick McGoohan's double in a 19th photograph of gardeners working at an English stately  home.
